topic: Dynamic Dataset Construction for Ethical AI Testing

  entities:
    Social-Chemistry-101|Dataset
    MoralChoice|Dataset
    Ethics|Dataset
    NormBank|Dataset
    Moral Stories|Dataset
    CultureBank|Dataset
    LLM|Technological Concept
    Metadata curator|Tool
    LLM-powered test case builder|Tool
    LLM-powered contextual variator|Tool

  proposition: Metadata curator uses dataset pool from Social-Chemistry-101, MoralChoice, Ethics, NormBank, Moral Stories, and CultureBank.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Metadata curator|USES|Social-Chemistry-101
    Metadata curator|USES|MoralChoice
    Metadata curator|USES|Ethics
    Metadata curator|USES|NormBank
    Metadata curator|USES|Moral Stories
    Metadata curator|USES|CultureBank

  proposition: LLM-powered test case builder creates queries based on ethical judgment and moral dilemmas.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    LLM-powered test case builder|CREATES|queries
    LLM-powered test case builder|FOCUSES_ON|ethical judgment
    LLM-powered test case builder|FOCUSES_ON|moral dilemmas

  proposition: LLM-powered contextual variator paraphrases queries, varying style, length, and format while avoiding sensitive information.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    LLM-powered contextual variator|PARAPHRASES|queries
    LLM-powered contextual variator|VARIES|style
    LLM-powered contextual variator|VARIES|length
    LLM-powered contextual variator|VARIES|format
    LLM-powered contextual variator|AVOIDS|sensitive information

topic: Model Performance Analysis in Ethical Evaluations

  entities:
    o1-preview|Model
    o1-mini|Model
    Llama-3.1-8B|Model
    QwQ-32B|Model
    Deepseek-chat|Model
    Yi-lightning|Model
    Gemini-1.5-Pro|Model
    Gemini-1.5-Flash|Model
    GPT-4o|Model

  proposition: Model utility and ethical performance are not consistently correlated.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|PERFORMANCE|inconsistent correlation

  proposition: o1-preview and o1-mini models do not consistently outperform other models in ethical evaluations.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    o1-preview|PERFORMANCE|modest
    o1-mini|PERFORMANCE|modest

  proposition: Llama-3.1-8B achieves 82.99% score in MoralStories category despite lower average performance.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama-3.1-8B|SCORE|82.99%
    Llama-3.1-8B|PERFORMANCE_IN|MoralStories

  proposition: QwQ-32B demonstrates outstanding performance with 100.00% in MoralChoice and 85.86% in CultureBank.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    QwQ-32B|SCORE_IN|MoralChoice|100.00%
    QwQ-32B|SCORE_IN|CultureBank|85.86%

  proposition: Deepseek-chat leads Social-chem category with 72.22% score.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Deepseek-chat|SCORE_IN|Social-chem|72.22%

  proposition: Yi-lightning achieves 81.50% in CultureBank category.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yi-lightning|SCORE_IN|CultureBank|81.50%

  proposition: Gemini-1.5-Pro and Gemini-1.5-Flash underperform in Ethics category.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gemini-1.5-Pro|PERFORMANCE_IN|Ethics|low
    Gemini-1.5-Flash|PERFORMANCE_IN|Ethics|low

  proposition: GPT-4o shows strong performance in Virtue (87.18%) and Justice (80.00%) categories.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT-4o|SCORE_IN|Virtue|87.18%
    GPT-4o|SCORE_IN|Justice|80.00%

  proposition: Gemini-1.5-Pro and Gemini-1.5-Flash score low in Utilitarianism at 37.50% and 35.00%.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gemini-1.5-Pro|SCORE_IN|Utilitarianism|37.50%
    Gemini-1.5-Flash|SCORE_IN|Utilitarianism|35.00%

topic: Advanced AI Risk Considerations

  entities:
    Generative models|Technological Concept
    AI|Technological Concept
    Ethics Guidelines for Trustworthy AI|Regulation

  proposition: Generative models raise ethical concerns about autonomous AI systems.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative models|RAISES_CONCERN|autonomous AI systems

  proposition: Growing worry about AI potentially pursuing undesirable goals.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI|POTENTIAL_RISK|undesirable goals

  proposition: Potential existential safety risks for humans from uncontrolled AI systems.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI|POSES_RISK|existential safety

  proposition: Ethics Guidelines for Trustworthy AI emphasize AI as a tool to enhance human well-being.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Ethics Guidelines for Trustworthy AI|EMPHASIZES|AI as human well-being tool

  proposition: Critical to assess LLM decision-making in scenarios protecting human welfare.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    LLM|REQUIRES_ASSESSMENT|decision-making
    LLM|PURPOSE|protecting human welfare

topic: Human Agency and AI Social Impact

  entities:
    AI systems|Technological Concept
    Data centers|Infrastructure

  proposition: Users should be able to make informed autonomous decisions about AI systems.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Users|RIGHT|informed autonomous decisions
    Users|DECISION_POWER|AI systems

  proposition: AI systems are becoming ubiquitous across all life areas.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI systems|CHARACTERISTIC|ubiquitous
    AI systems|PRESENCE|all life areas

  proposition: Ethical considerations include energy source choices for data centers.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Data centers|ETHICAL_CONSIDERATION|energy source choices
